column4: I have WG111t wireless network usb card and I have ndiswrapper 1.2 installed and the driver saying "driver present, hardware present" but it doesn't show up under System-Administration-Networking. Can anyone help me?
so you dont have wlan nor ath0 nor ra0 or whatever...  are you sure your card is usable in linux?
i hink i can not help you :( sorry
